doc:
Chris Taylor (wrestler) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chris_Taylor_(wrestler) 0 Christopher J. "Chris" Taylor (June 13, 1950 – June 30, 1979) was an American super-heavyweight wrestler. He competed in freestyle and Greco-Roman events at the 1972 Olympics and won a bronze medal in the freestyle. At 412 pounds (187 kg) he was the heaviest Olympian ever until the appearance of judoka Ricardo Blas, Jr. in 2008. (Weight limits have since been imposed). Christopher_J._"_Chris_"_Taylor ( June_13_,_1950 – June_30_,_1979 ) was an_American_super-heavyweight_wrestler . He competed in freestyle_and_Greco-Roman_events at the_1972_Olympics and won a_bronze_medal in the_freestyle . At 412_pounds ( 187_kg ) he was the_heaviest_Olympian ever until the_appearance of judoka_Ricardo_Blas , Jr. in 2008 . (_Weight_limits have_since_been_imposed ) .
